about_the_game:
Get under the skin of your enemy with the X-Rayted DLC Pack. Featuring the luminous green X-ray weapon skin, usable across all gun models, it’s sure to send a chill down any adversary’s spine.
Featuring:
  • X-Ray Weapon Skin
Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
